turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there! I'd like to order a pizza from Luna Pizzaria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. Which store would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The closest one if possible, they're all pretty good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just a margherita pizza would nice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Personal or large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A personal one should be good?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Any special crusts or toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the regular one is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else? Any salads or deserts or drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually a salad doesn't sound too bad. What kind do you have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is a chopped salad, a Luna Caesar salad, an arugula and fennel salad and a Cobb salad.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll go with the Caesar then. That sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like? Mini, small or large?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A mini is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else? A desert or a drink maybe.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I don't have any drinks here. How about an iced tea?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that should be all. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. It should be delivered to you shortly. Have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
